nushi_iwa_0005_friend_02:
So, from what I can gather, the Stony Cliff Titan
likes to lurk somewhere in this rocky area.[VAR 0114(0006)]
nushi_iwa_0005_friend_03:
I had a look around, but I couldn’t find any trace
of it![VAR 0114(0006)]
nushi_iwa_0005_friend_04:
Maybe it’s way up high on a cliff or something?\c
...Nah, that’s impossible!\c
I don’t think it’d be hiding somewhere that tricky,
so don’t go falling off any cliffs or anything trying\r
to search it out somewhere too strange.\c
Maybe just give your map app a look if you’re
feeling stumped? It’s pretty handy![VAR 0114(0006)]
